options.fig.cap: Overall meta analysis outline. Stage 1: Comparing CNAP to invasive, and CNAP to non-invasive. Stage 2: Comparing each method (volume clamp and arterial applanation tonometry) to invasive and non-invasive. Stage 3: Comparing each device (CNAPÂ® Monitor, Finapres Medical Systems, Clearsight System (foremely known as Nexfin), and Tensys T-Line)) to invasive and non-invasive. Stage 4: Comparing each device in three settings (ICU, OR, and other) to invasive and non-invasive.
